meanings.definition: (フィリピン、タガログ語)解放、安堵、緩和、救済

examples.sentence: Ang guminhawa ay nadama ng lahat pagkatapos ng bagyo.
examples.translation: Everyone felt relief after the storm.
examples.english_translation: Everyone felt relief after the storm.

meanings.definition: (フィリピン、タガログ語)解放される、安堵する、緩和される、救済される
meanings.english_definition: (Philippines, Tagalog) to be liberated, to be relieved, to be alleviated, to be eased

examples.sentence: Guminhawa ang kanyang kalooban nang malaman ang magandang balita.
examples.translation: His spirit was relieved upon hearing the good news.
examples.english_translation: His spirit was relieved upon hearing the good news.
